replies.author: Real_Scl
replies.txt_content:
增加记分板：
/scoreboard objectives add Deaths deathCount
/scoreboard objectives add Kills totalKillCount  总击杀
/scoreboard objectives add PlayerKills playerKillCount  击杀玩家
显示：
/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar Deaths 
最后一个自由更换
